The Elections Commission requests all persons above 18 years to inform the elections office if the names are not included in the 2017 register.The draft of the electoral register - 2017 has been completed and it can be viewed from the www.elections.gov.lk, said the Elections Commission (EC). title: EC requests to confirm registration for 2017
